pull.title: [qa] wallet: Wait for reindex to catch up

events.message: [qa] wallet: Wait for reindex to catch up

issue.title: Switch to a constant-space Merkle root/branch algorithm.
issue.body:
On top of #445 

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6550 - Do not store Merkle branches in the wallet.
    * skipped commit 3b33ec8, not confident that this is a good way to cache validation
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/6508 - Switch to a constant-space Merkle root/branch algorithm.
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7757 - [qa] wallet: Wait for reindex to catch up
